articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Yun Ki Jong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Yun Ki Jong
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of Yun Ki Jong, alternate member of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and honorary professor at Kim Il Sung University, on August 14, expressing deep condolences over her death.

articles.title: Lao Vice-PM Here
articles.content:
Lao Vice-PM Here
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Somsavath Lengsavath, standing vice-prime minister of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, and his party arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Ro Tu Chol Meets Lao Vice-PM
articles.content:
Ro Tu Chol Meets Lao Vice-PM
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Vice-Premier of the DPRK Ro Tu Chol met and had a friendly talk with Somsavath Lengsavath, standing vice-prime minister of Laos, and his party on Monday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him at the People's Palace of Culture.

articles.title: DPRK Govt Arranges Reception for Lao Vice-PM
articles.content:
DPRK Govt Arranges Reception for Lao Vice-PM
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government arranged a reception for Somsavath Lengsavath, standing vice-prime minister of Laos, and his party at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday. 
					 Present there on invitation were Somsavath Lengsavath and his party and Chaleune Warinthrasak, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Vice-Premier of the DPRK Ro Tu Chol, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Pak Kil Yon, Vice-Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Myong San and officials concerned were on hand.
					
					 Ro Tu Chol said at the reception that President Kim Il Sung and President Kaysone Phomvihane provided the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK government to develop the traditional and comradely relations of friendship and cooperation with Laos, he said, sincerely hoping that the Lao people would build a more prosperous socialist state under the leadership of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party.
					
					 Somsavath Lengsavath in his speech said that the friendly and cooperative relations between Laos and the DPRK provided by Kaysone Phomvihane and Kim Il Sung are steadily growing stronger under the deep concern of Choummaly Saynasone and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The party and the government of Laos support the struggle of the WPK and the DPRK to accomplish the socialist cause, build a thriving nation and achieve the independent reunification of the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, he stressed.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Friendship Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Friendship Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with the visiting Chinese youth friendship delegation led by Zhou Zhangkui, member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday. 
					 Noting that the delegation got deep impressions of the DPRK, its head said that the young people of the DPRK are playing the role of vanguard in building a great prosperous and powerful nation under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Japanese Delegation
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Japanese Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from the delegation of the Japanese Society for the Study of the Juche Idea on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The floral basket was handed over to an official concerned on Monday by Seiichi Sakugawa, president of the National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea who is leading the delegation.

articles.title: Exhibition of New Technologies Opens
articles.content:
Exhibition of New Technologies Opens
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The 11th national exhibition of inventions and new technologies opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition on Monday. 
					Displayed there are new products, models, sand tables, diagrams and multi-media on at least 1,100 valuable inventions and new technologies appreciated at ministries and national institutions.
					
					 On display there are many achievements that help put IT and NANO technology, bio-engineering and others on the latest level as required by the IT age and make a substantial contribution to bringing about a turn in developing the nation's economy and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 The dissemination of new science and technology will take place in diverse forms and methods including public presentations and technological workshop and discussions will be held on the issues of introducing and generalizing scientific and technological achievements in production and construction while the exhibition is under way. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Jon Ha Chol, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Ri Ja Bang, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, Kim Yong Jin, chairman of the Education Commission, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, officials concerned, scientists and technicians.

articles.title: Head of Chinese Friendship Delegation Interviewed
articles.content:
Head of Chinese Friendship Delegation Interviewed
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Zhou Zhangkui, member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China, who headed the Chinese youth friendship delegation was interviewed by KCNA Monday before his departure.
					Noting that he was deeply impressed to visit several places of the DPRK, he said that gifts displayed at the International Friendship Exhibition House reflect the ardent reverence of the world people for President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League has an important role to play in building a thriving nation.
					
					 The long-standing Sino-DPRK friendly relations are growing stronger under the deep concern of Hu Jintao and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We bear deep in mind that it is the noble duty of the younger generation to carry forward and develop these relations. 
					
					 It is our determination to make a positive contribution to the development of the above-said ties of friendship.
					
					 The Sino-DPRK friendship will be everlasting.

articles.title: "Arirang" Goes On
articles.content:
"Arirang" Goes On
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", a winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, has been given  at May Day Stadium in Pyongyang from August 2, drawing a large number of people.
					 The spectators are enraptured by spirited gymnastic movements, wonderful dances and kaleidoscopic background.
					
					 Musical pieces strong in national emotion and high in artistry, peculiar stage settings, up-to-date electric display board and laser illuminators add to the beauty of the performance.
					
					 The background stand shows such magnificent views as newly built Mansudae Street, reclaimed Taegyedo tideland, Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm and new fertilizer and steel production processes.
					
					 Ri Hye Sun, a 43-year-old resident in Chongnyu-dong No. 2 in Taedonggang District, Pyongyang, told KCNA that the performance was really a masterpiece inspiring the Korean nation with a pride of having the peerlessly great men.
					
					 According to Kim Kum Ryong, a senior director of the performance, Chapter 5 "Arirang of Friendship" has been added to the performance and some parts of the performance recreated in a short span of time to show new gymnastic movements, dances and background pictures.

articles.title: Organic Farming Method Introduced in Farms
articles.content:
Organic Farming Method Introduced in Farms
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- An organic farming method has been applied to many farms in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Kosan County, Kangwon Province, has produced vegetable agrochemicals with raw materials abundant in the area to exterminate harmful insects in rice, corn and bean fields.
					
					 The agrochemicals produced by the plant epidemic prevention office of the county have many strong points. They, low in production cost, promote the early growth of crops and their effect exists longer than chemical ones.
					
					 Cooperative farms in South Phyongan Province, including the Ryongjung Cooperative Farm in Mundok County, have produced compound microbiological fertilizers suitable to different crops.
					
					 Taehongdan County, Ryanggang Province, has established a piglet breeding system to increase the number of piglets and boosted the production of liquid manure in the first half of the year 1.5 times compared with the same period of last year.
					
					 The Unha Cooperative Farm in Unjon County, North Phyongan Province, has increased the number of domestic animals to produce large quantities of organic fertilizers, while using mud snails in weeding rice fields.

articles.title: Mineral Water Stands Appear in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Mineral Water Stands Appear in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Many stands have been installed in Pyongyang to serve Kangso Mineral Water in the hot season.
					 Since early times the mineral water has been well known for its efficacy in prevention and treatment of diseases. Its taste is also good. 
					
					 It contains such ion ingredients as bicarbonate, calcium, magnesium, sodium and iron as well as free carbonic acid and many microelements. 
					
					 It, which had been taken only by rich folks until the liberation of the country, has been available for all the people since the liberation thanks to the government's popular policies.

articles.title: KCNA Warns US and S. Korea Military Maneuvers
articles.content:
KCNA Warns US and S. Korea Military Maneuvers
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the U.S. reckless military adventure is now inching close to the point of explosion.
					 The U.S. kicked off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises together with the south Korean puppet forces, defying strong protest and denunciation from the DPRK and the international community.
					
					The exercises will reportedly involve the U.S. nuclear-powered carrier "George Washington", at least 30,000 U.S. troops in south Korea and abroad and huge troops of the puppet army.
					
					 UFG means an escalation of the adventurous nuclear war maneuvers of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces to ignite an all-out war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The aggressive and offensive nature of the war maneuvers was brought to light by the recent open remarks made by the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers that through a series of joint military exercises they would increase their coordinated defense capability and send a clear message to the DPRK that it should halt its "hostile acts".
					
					 It is quite preposterous for them to send such message after falsifying the truth about the warship case and kicking off offensive exercises against the DPRK under that pretext. 
					
					 The nuclear war exercises are actions for a war of aggression against the DPRK, to all intents and purposes, as the master and his servant put their loud-mouthed stringent "sanctions" and "strong pressure" upon the DPRK into practice.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet forces' military provocation is by no means a military demonstration of defensive nature or annual military maneuvers to cope with "threat" from someone.
					
					 This goes to clearly prove that the U.S. and the south Korean warhawks' reckless scenario to mount a preemptive surprise nuclear strike at the DPRK is becoming a reality as it is an outright challenge to the international community demanding detente on the Korean Peninsula while refuting the story about the DPRK's "linkage" to the "Cheonan" case.
					
					 The prevailing situation in which the U.S. is bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang heavily on the Korean Peninsula while escalating military pressure upon the DPRK once again convinces its army and people how it was just when it had access to nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces will face the serious consequences to be entailed by their reckless military provocations driving the situation on the peninsula to the worst phase under the pretext of "Cheonan" case.
					
					 The U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors should clearly understand the army of the DPRK highly alerted with iron will and firm stand never says empty words.

articles.title: US and S. Korea Military Exercises Blasted
articles.content:
US and S. Korea Military Exercises Blasted
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers recently announced that they would stage Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises with the U.S. from August 16 to 26. This is one more grave military provocation to wreck peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and ignite a nuclear war. Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed commentary.
					 UFG is dangerous saber-rattling aimed at "generally examining and improving" the capacity for an actual war to seize the DPRK all of a sudden and preparations for mobilizing manpower and material resources of south Korea for the war, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The above-said exercises will be led by the U.S. and participated in by the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces treble those involved last year.
					
					 It is not difficult to guess the danger of the war exercises to be staged by the U.S. holding the prerogative of command over operations with unprecedentedly huge troops for aggression from overseas involved.
					
					 What merits attention is that the warmongers are contemplating staging a commando drill pursuant to an "operation plan for rescuing hostages" under the simulated conditions of "a large-scale hostage incident" in the northern half of Korea.
					
					 The military provocation of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers against the DPRK is unprecedented in the light of its scale, aggressive nature and long period. The situation prevailing in the peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia has reached the point of explosion in the true sense of the word. This grave situation goes to clearly prove who is the real criminal escalating the military confrontation and tensions on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korea Accused of Tightening "Alliance" with US
articles.content:
S. Korea Accused of Tightening "Alliance" with US
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The so-called "alliance" between the U.S. and south Korea is nothing but one between the master and his servant and the latter, therefore, can never get rid of domination, subjugation and submission. The "tightened" alliance with the U.S. only means its increased domination and control over south Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The actions taken by the U.S. recently to tighten the "alliance" with south Korea under the absurd pretext of the warship "Cheonan" case are nothing but a revelation of its sinister scenario to put the south Korean puppet group under the yoke of thorough subjugation and carry out its strategy for dominating the DPRK with ease.
					
					 Herein lies the reason why the U.S. ruling quarters are now becoming so assertive for closer "alliance," while pretending to pay heed to the solicitation of the group.
					
					 The U.S. is becoming evermore undisguised in its moves to put the DPRK under its domination as the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is   blindly toeing the U.S. policy, hell-bent on sycophancy and treachery and confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that the south Korean puppet group's above-said moves are bringing the danger of a nuclear war to the Korean Peninsula. It kicked off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises with the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces today. It is blustering that UFG is a demonstration of "strong alliance" with the U.S. but this, in fact, is bringing only the danger of a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 In case a nuclear war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula, the Koreans in the north and the south would suffer from it and the U.S. will fish in troubled waters.
					
					 The Lee group is a band of traitors without equals in the world as it prolongs its remaining days by selling off the interests of the nation to foreign forces and the root cause of the nation's misfortune as it is keen to bring the destiny of the fellow countrymen to ruin through sycophancy and treachery.

articles.title: Japan's Nuclear Weaponization under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Nuclear Weaponization under Fire
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Japanese Prime Minister Naoto Kan at a recent press conference held in Hiroshima said that nuclear deterrence continues to be necessary for Japan. He let loose sheer sophism, citing "threat" being created by nuclear development of someone as a reason for this. His assertion implies that Japan should have access to nuclear weapons for "advance prevention" as it is exposed to "nuclear threat".
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed commentary observes:
					
					 Lurking behind this is the sinister intention of the Japanese reactionaries to cover up the truth of their nuclear issue under the pretext of "nuclear threat" and go nuclear behind the scene at any cost. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have ceaselessly pushed ahead with nuclear weaponization behind the curtain of the "three non-nuclear principles".
					
					 The nuclear weaponization is the invariable ambition of Japan. The Japanese reactionaries regard that Japan sustained a defeat in the Second World War because its military power was weak. So, they seek to realize the wild ambition of militarism after taking revenge for Japan's defeat by going nuclear at any cost. To this end, they have systematically studied and developed nuclear-related technology and facilities and steadily stockpiled plutonium. 
					
					 Now Japan possesses plutonium enough to make thousands of nukes. Not content with this, it keeps stockpiling nuclear materials. It has laid all material and technical foundations for making and possessing lots of nukes in a moment. The danger of Japan's nuclear weaponization is becoming a reality. It is proven with added clarity by the scope of operation of the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" which is expanding worldwide, going beyond the vicinity of Japan.
					
					 Going nuclear will lead Japan to self-destruction. It had better drop its reckless nuclear ambition, well aware of this.

articles.title: "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" Declared Null
articles.content:
"Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" Declared Null
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Christians in south Korea and Japan held a joint press conference on Aug. 13 to declare the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty", fabricated by the Japanese imperialists, null and void, according to south Korean CBS. 
					 The Japanese government has persistently turned away its face from the fabricated "treaty", the organizations at the conference pointed out, urging it to probe the truth behind the treaty to the world. 
					
					 They demanded that the Japanese authorities make an apology and reparation to the victims of the issue of "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army and forced draft and conscription committed under the past colonial domination over Korea.
					
					 They held that the Japanese government should work together toward the improvement of inter-Korean relations and the peaceful reunification of the Korean Peninsula, clearly mindful that the misfortune and pain the Korean nation are suffering are ascribable to Japan.

articles.title: Japanese PM Statement Censured in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japanese PM Statement Censured in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Core members of all political parties and religious circles in south Korea made public a declaration on the situation censuring a statement of the Japanese prime minister on Aug. 13 as regards the 65th anniversary of the August 15 liberation of Korea and the centenary of the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty", according to south Korea's CBS.
					 The declaration charged that in his statement the Japanese prime minister neither recognized the nullification of the "treaty" nor mentioned any reparation for the issue of "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army, etc.
					
					 The "treaty" is totally invalid, it said, strongly urging the Japanese government to stop at once its "claim to Tok Islets", distortion of the history, etc.

articles.title: Germ Weapon Test Conducted by Japan Disclosed
articles.content:
Germ Weapon Test Conducted by Japan Disclosed
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A secret germ weapon test conducted by the Japanese imperialists in Pusan during World War II was disclosed on Aug. 12, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 This was disclosed by "an outline of the research conducted by Group No. 6 of Technical Research Institute No. 9 (Noborito Institute) of the imperial ground force", a document worked out by a researcher who participated in the test at that time carried in the book titled "The truth of the above-said institute" published in Japan on July 28.
					
					 According to it, the Japanese imperialists manufactured germ weapons at the Noborito Institute, a secret weapon research institute which operated in Japan during World War II.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists selected part of the area around the Veterinary Institute under the "Government-General of Korea" in Pusan as an outdoor centre for experiment on infection in May 1944 and conducted test on the performance of germ weapon there.
					
					 As the test was conducted in top secrecy at that time, the atrocity was not known to public at all.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Songun Leadership Celebrated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Songun Leadership Celebrated
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Costa Rica and Panama issued bulletins to commemorate the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership. Carried in the bulletins were pictures of the leader and contents praising his Songun politics.
					 The bulletin of the Costa Rican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea in an article described
						 Kim Jong Il's Songun politics as a main factor that helps the DPRK, not a big country, defend its sovereignty and dignity and emerge victorious in the showdown with the U.S. styling itself the "only superpower" in the world. 
					
					 It noted that Kim Jong Il saw to it that ideological education was intensified among servicepersons so that they could fully discharge their mission as defenders of the socialist country. He also firmly established the trait of giving priority to the military affairs throughout the whole society and perfected the work for putting all the people under arms and turning the whole country into a fortress on a higher level, it added. 
					
					 The bulletin of the Circle of Studies for the Juche Idea in Panama said that Kim Jong Il has further cemented the single-minded unity of the whole society through his Songun leadership and brought about an eye-opening reality in which rapid progress is made to build a thriving nation. 
					
					 A turning-point was made for Korea's reunification and the international position of the DPRK has been remarkably enhanced under his Songun leadership, the bulletin noted, stressing that many countries and international organizations and personages of political and social circles have extended full support to the DPRK government's stand and measures taken to cope with the imperialists' anti-DPRK moves.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de difunta Yun Ki Jong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de difunta Yun Ki Jong
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio el dia 14 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro de la difunta Yun Ki Jong, miembro suplente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, diputada a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y profesora honoraria de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Fallecio Yun Ki Jong
articles.content:
Fallecio Yun Ki Jong
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ATCC) -- Yun Ki Jong, miembro suplente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, diputada a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y profesora honoraria de la Universidad     Kim Il Sung, fallecio a las 09:30 del dia 13 a los 81 anos de edad por la paralisis cardiaca aguda.
					Durante el periodo de la dominacion colonial del imperialismo japones, ella vivio sufriendo las desgracias de apatridas.
					
					Despues de la liberacion de la patria, crecio como funcionaria talentosa en el regazo del Presidente Kim Il Sung y lucho abnegadamente por el partido y la revolucion.
					
					Durante largo tiempo, trabajo en los puestos importantes del organo estatal de economia y la institucion docente y dedico toda su inteligencia y pasion para acelerar la construccion economica socialista y desarrollar la educacion de las generaciones venideras.
					
					En reconocimiento de sus meritos realizados por el partido y la revolucion, se le otorgaron la Orden Kim Il Sung y otras condecoraciones del Estado.
					
					Fue publicada el dia 13 la esquela mortuoria a nombre comun del Comite Central del PTC y el Presidium de la APS de la RPDC.

articles.title: Portavoz del EMG del EPC advierte a EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz del EMG del EPC advierte a EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ATCC) -- En relacion con que los provocativos ejercicios conjuntos maritimos de los belicistas yanquis y la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, desarrollados en los Mares Este y Oeste de Corea, pasan al simulacro de guerra total "Ulji Freedom Guardian" que se efectuara del dia 16 al 26, el portavoz del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 15 una declaracion.
					  Las enormes fuerzas armadas de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas incluyendo los medios de golpe nuclear ya estan desplegadas en el Sur de Corea y su contorno maritimo y los colectivos de operaciones terrestres, navales y aereas, que seran lanzados en el tiempo de emergencia en el frente coreano, se ven dispuestos de partida en la linea del Pacifico central y el territorio norteamericano.
					
					  En el Sur de Corea se movilizan en el presente simulacro no solo las fuerzas armadas en activo y de reserva sino tambien los organos administrativos titeres locales y las companias civiles.
					
					  Si el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" fue la primera etapa de la imprudente provocacion militar llena de invenciones e intrigas sin precedentes en la historia contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el simulacro "Ulji Freedom Guardian" y otros alborotos belicos devienen la etapa de accion real para la invasion militar, porque el presente simulacro, que se desarrolla con la mascara de la "defensa", deviene el abierto ejercicio de guerra de agresion a la RPDC que se perpetra tomandola por blanco.
					
					  La situacion actual demuestra que esos alborotos belicos son los innegables ejercicios para la guerra total anti-RPDC y el simulacro de guerra nuclear de mayor envergadura en la historia tanto en el tamano de los medios y fuerzas movilizados como en su contenido y caracter.
					
					  La realidad prueba fehacientemente que el proyecto de la construccion del "mundo sin armas nucleares" o la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana de que habla tanto la administracion estadounidense Obama no pasan de ser una hipocresia y revela los archi-crimenes antinacionales y anti-reunificacion de la banda vendepatria de Lee Myung Bak que sigue a ciegas a su amo gringo.
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea no quedan sorprendidos jamas ante los imprudentes alborotos de provocacion de guerra de los belicistas contra la RPDC.
					
					  En este momento en que llegan al punto limite tales campanas, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea daran el duro castigo implacable a los imperialistas yanquis y la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak como lo declararon al interior y exterior del pais.
					
					  Esta contramedida militar sera un castigo mas demoledor que nadie ha experimentado en este mundo.
					
					  La administracion Obama de EE.UU. debe enfriar su cabeza calentada por las maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento contra la RPDC y reflexionar profundamente el significado de la tajante decision y severa declaracion expuestas por la RPDC para defender la dignidad del pais y la nacion.
					
					  La banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, acostumbrada por el servilismo y sumision a las grandes potencias, conocera pronto como sera el destino del vendepatria.
					
					  Cuanto mas los belicistas recurren a los imprudentes alborotos belicos con la erronea decision politica, tanto mas caeran con mas rapidez y mas profundidad en la tumba de autodestruccion.

articles.title: Publicado llamamiento con motivo del 65o aniversario de liberacion
articles.content:
Publicado llamamiento con motivo del 65o aniversario de liberacion
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 65o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria, el comite norteno, el sureno y el ultramarino por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio publicaron el dia 15 un llamamiento a todos los coreanos en el interior y el exterior del pais.
					Aunque pasaron 65 anos desde la liberacion de la patria, la Peninsula Coreana esta dividida todavia en dos partes y no se ha eliminado el peligro de guerra, senala la nota y continua:
					
					La Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre son las declaraciones por la independencia nacional y la reunificacion pacifica y ejecutarlas es el remedio para su solucion.
					
					Ahora, se agravan cada dia mas en esta tierra la tension militar y el peligro de guerra y esto traera solo la catastrofe de la nacion coreana.
					
					Todos los coreanos deben frustrar rotundamente los actos hostiles de toda indole de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites que recurren a la guerra y la confrontacion y fortalecer la solidaridad y la unidad mediante las visitas reciprocas y contactos de distintos sectores y capas del Norte y el Sur.
					
					En este ano coinciden 100 anos y 105 anos de la invencion del "Tratado de Anexion de Corea a Japon" y del "Tratado de 5 puntos de Ulsa", respectivamente.
					
					Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben hacer a Japon que pida disculpas e indemnice sus historicos actos criminales contra la nacion coreana.
					
					El espiritu por la independencia y la libertad de los martires antijaponeses palpita hoy fuertemente en el corazon de todos los coreanos.
					
					!Logremos a toda costa la reunificacion independiente poniendo punto final a la division nacional al heredar el proposito de los martires patrioticos quienes dedicaron sin titubeos sus vidas por liberar el pais arrebatado por el imperialismo japones!
					
					!Con las fuerzas unidas bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, cumplamos la causa historica de la reunificacion de la patria!

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena "Ulji Freedom Guardian"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena "Ulji Freedom Guardian"
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ATCC) --   Recientemente, los belicistas titeres surcoreanos anunciaron que desarrollarian del dia 16 al 26 junto con Estados Unidos el ejercicio militar conjunto "Ulji Freedom Guardian". 
					Esto deviene otra grave provocacion militar para romper la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico y desencadenar la guerra nuclear.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 16 y continua:
					
					"Ulji Freedom Guardian" resulta el peligroso ejercicio orientado a "revisar y mejorar totalmente" la capacidad de guerra real para invadir sorpresivamente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el estado de preparacion de los recursos humanos y materiales del Sur de Corea para la guerra.
					
					 A diferencia del ano pasado, este ano se realizara bajo el patrocinio de EE.UU. y se movilizaran las tropas agresoras norteamericanas tres veces mayores en comparacion del ano pasado.
					
					  Todos podran adivinar facilmente si es peligrosa o no esa maniobra que seria comandada por EE.UU. y contara con la presencia de las fuerzas agresoras insolitamente enormes que provienen del extranjero.
					
					  Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que en el marco del presente ejercicio, los belicistas tratan de desarrollar el entrenamiento de tropas especiales segun el llamado "plan operacional de rescate de rehenes" suponiendo el "surgimiento de numerosos rehenes" en la RPDC.
					
					  Esta provocacion militar contra la RPDC no tiene precedentes tanto en su dimension y caracter agresivo como en su duracion. La situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico esta a punto de explosion y muestra claramente quien es el culpable verdadero de la agravacion de enfrentamiento militar y tension.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena armamento nuclear de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena armamento nuclear de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ATCC) -- En su reciente rueda de prensa ofrecida en Hiroshima, el premier japones Naoto Kan dijo que el "disuasivo nuclear sera necesario tambien en el futuro para Japon" porque se crea la "amenaza" por el desarrollo nuclear de alguien.
					  Este criterio absurdo consiste en que Japon debe poseer las armas nucleares para "prevenir" la "amenaza nuclear".
					
					  Esto muestra la ambicion siniestra de los reaccionarios japoneses de encubrir los verdaderos aspectos del problema nuclear de su pais y armarse con artefactos nucleares detras del cartel de "amenaza nuclear" proveniente de alguien.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 16 y continua:
					
					  Bajo el cartel de los "tres principios de la desnuclearizacion", los reaccionarios japoneses vienen impulsando incesantemente las maniobras de armamento nuclear.
					
					  La posesion de armas nucleares es la invariable ambicion de Japon. Los reaccionarios japoneses piensan que su derrota en la Segunda Guerra Mundial se debe a la debilidad de las fuerzas armadas.
					
					  Por eso, ellos tratan de realizar a toda costa el armamento nuclear para desquitarse de su derrota y satisfacer la ambicion militarista.
					
					  Por esta razon, ellos han venido investigando y desarrollando de manera sistematica las tecnicas e instalaciones nucleares y almacenando sin parar el plutonio.
					
					  Como si no bastara la cantidad de plutonio con que puede fabricar miles de armas nucleares, Japon sigue almacenando las sustancias militares.
					
					  Ya preparo la base material y tecnica para fabricar y poseer en cualquier momento numerosos artefactos nucleares.
					
					  Tiene el caracter real la peligrosidad del armamento nuclear de Japon. 
					
					  Lo muestra el hecho de que la esfera de actividades de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon se amplia a escala mundial traspasando las periferias de Japon. 
					
					  Si Japon no abandona el armamento nuclear, no podra evitar su ruina.
					
					  El debe saberlo claramente y abandonar su imprudente ambicion nuclear.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica "alianza" del Sur de Corea con EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica "alianza" del Sur de Corea con EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ATCC) -- La llamada "alianza" entre Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea no sera mas que la relacion entre el amo y el lacayo y entre el dominante y el subyugado y sumiso. Por lo tanto, el "fortalecimiento" de esa alianza significa la profundizacion de la dominacion y la subyugacion de EE.UU. sobre el Sur de Corea.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual divulgado este lunes y continua:
					
					EE.UU. procedio a fortalecer la "alianza" con el Sur de Corea pretextando el intrigante caso de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan". Esto parte de su malsana intencion de apretar el yugo de subyugacion a los titeres surcoreanos y realizar facilmente la estrategia de dominar a Corea.
					
					Por eso, en estos dias, la capa gobernante de EE.UU. finge aceptar la peticion de los titeres surcoreanos hablando tanto del fortalecimiento de la "alianza".
					
					Las maniobras de EE.UU. de dominar a Corea se tornan mas atrevidas debido a la ciega sumision proyanqui de la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak enloquecida por el servilismo a grandes potencias y la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Lo mas grave es que las maniobras de los titeres surcoreanos para el fortalecimiento de la "alianza" con EE.UU. implican el peligro de la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana. A partir del 16 de agosto, ellos desarrollan el ejercicio militar conjunto "Ulji Freedom Guardian" junto con las tropas agresoras norteamericanas. Si bien dicen que esta maniobra es para demostrar la "relacion de firme alianza" con EE.UU., pero, lo que causa ella a la nacion coreana es el peligro de la guerra nuclear de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					La victima de la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana es la nacion coreana en el Norte y el Sur y el que saca provechos es EE.UU.
					
					De veras, la horda de Lee Myung Bak es la de los traidores que bajo el abrigo de las fuerzas foraneas, mantienen su vida restante vendiendo los intereses nacionales. Por eso, se dice que ella es la causa de desastres nacionales que trata de acabar con el destino nacional vendiendo el pais y sirviendo a las grandes potencias.
